mapper.sql: mspcd.product_carton_det_id, mspcd.product_carton_id, mspcd.work_order_barcode_id, mspcd.remark, mspcd.org_id, mspcd.create_user_id, mspcd.create_time, mspcd.modified_user_id, mspcd.modified_time, mspcd.is_delete
mapper.select:
select FROM mes_sfc_product_carton_det mspcd LEFT JOIN mes_sfc_product_carton mspc ON mspc.product_carton_id = mspcd.product_carton_id
and mspc.close_status = #{closeStatus}
